title: Healthcare Practical Competency Enhancement: VR-Based Online Language Learning Using Multimodal Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital device usage skills and beginner-level language learning experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners achieve 80% accuracy in producing 20 key expressions using multimodal (audio+text) lecture content in a VR environment.
Learners identify and apply at least three context-specific language use strategies through simulation activities.
Learners achieve over 75% of weekly learning outcomes via formative assessments and compose self-evaluation reports.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
